sentences.sentence: I saw the gleam of the knife as it flashed through the air.
sentences.translation: 我看见了刀在空中划过时的闪光。

sentences.sentence: There is no gleam of hope.
Their hope did not last long; the gleam was quickly eclipsed.
sentences.translation: 他们的希望没有延长多久，微光很快就消逝了。
